scripts.clean: cd .. ; find . -name ._* -delete ; find . -name .DS_Store -delete ; rm -Rf tmp/* ; rm -Rf logs/* ; cd webos
scripts.commit: npm run clean && git add . --all && git commit && git push origin main
scripts.php:
printf 'ðŸŒŠ Ocean Solutions

scripts.apache: brew services stop httpd ; brew services start httpd
scripts.test: for i in test/*.js; do node $i;done
